title: Enhancing Web Development Practical Competencies: The Role of Higher Education Third-Space Experts—A Reflective Case Study

context.prior_knowledge: Three or more years of mathematics education experience, with foundational LMS proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core roles of third-space experts (trust-building, linking skills and pedagogy) in higher education environments.
Learners can diagnose complex problems in educational settings and propose improvements using a reflective case analysis framework.
Learners can complete a project designing mathematics pedagogy and technology integration by collaborating in real-time with peer teachers via live streaming tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
